languages.text: "Откроем сердца Ему, ибо даже в этой зловонной ксеносской тьме Он услышит нас. О чем ты хочешь молить Защитника нашего?"
"Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"
languages.original_text: "Откроем сердца Ему, ибо даже в этой зловонной ксеносской тьме Он услышит нас. О чем ты хочешь молить Защитника нашего?"

traits.locale_text: "Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"
"Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"
"Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"
"Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"
"Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"

languages.text: "Öffnen wir Ihm unsere Herzen, denn selbst in dieser stinkenden Dunkelheit der Unreinheit der Xenos hört Er unsere Stimmen. Worum wollt Ihr unseren Beschützer bitten?"
languages.original_text: "Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"

traits.locale_text: "Öffnen wir Ihm unsere Herzen, denn selbst in dieser stinkenden Dunkelheit der Unreinheit der Xenos hört Er unsere Stimmen. Worum wollt Ihr unseren Beschützer bitten?"

languages.text: « Ouvrons-Lui nos cœurs, car jusque dans ces ténèbres fétides d'impureté xénos, Il entend notre appel. Que souhaitez-vous demander à notre Protecteur ? »
languages.original_text: "Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"

traits.locale_text: « Ouvrons-Lui nos cœurs, car jusque dans ces ténèbres fétides d'impureté xénos, Il entend notre appel. Que souhaitez-vous demander à notre Protecteur ? »

languages.text: 「主に我らの心を開こう。この異種族の不浄なる闇に満ちた場所でさえ、主は我らの声をお聞き届けくださる。我らが守護者に何を祈るというのだ？」
languages.original_text: "Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"

traits.locale_text: 「主に我らの心を開こう。この異種族の不浄なる闇に満ちた場所でさえ、主は我らの声をお聞き届けくださる。我らが守護者に何を祈るというのだ？」

languages.text: «Abramos nuestros corazones a Él, pues, incluso en esta fétida oscuridad impregnada de la impureza de los xenos, nuestras voces llegan a Sus oídos. ¿Qué desea pedirle a nuestro Protector?».
languages.original_text: "Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"

traits.locale_text: «Abramos nuestros corazones a Él, pues, incluso en esta fétida oscuridad impregnada de la impureza de los xenos, nuestras voces llegan a Sus oídos. ¿Qué desea pedirle a nuestro Protector?».

languages.text: “让我们向神皇敞开心扉吧。即便是在如此污秽的黑暗之中，祂也能听到我们的声音。你想向我们的守护神祈祷些什么呢？”
languages.original_text: "Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"

traits.locale_text: “让我们向神皇敞开心扉吧。即便是在如此污秽的黑暗之中，祂也能听到我们的声音。你想向我们的守护神祈祷些什么呢？”

languages.text: "Kalplerimizi O'na açalım. Nihayetinde O, zenoların pislikleriyle dolu bu kokuşmuş karanlıkta bile sesimizi duyar. Koruyucumuzadan dualarında ne dilemek istiyorsun?"
languages.original_text: "Let us open our hearts to Him, for even in this fetid darkness of xenos impurity, He hears our voices. What wish you to pray to our Protector for?"
